verses.text: Ix tak'wixi winhaj Job chi' icha tik:
Vojtac wal sik'lab'il to icha chi' yaji. Palta, ¿toc ay junok onh syal calanoch ko b'a wach'il t'a yichanh Dios?
Q'uinaloc sco telaj ko b'a yet'oc, malaj am junok tas syal ko pacan t'ay t'a miloc tas sk'anb'ej t'ayonh.
Ha Dios te niwan sjelanil yet' spoder. Q'uinaloc sco tek'b'ej ko b'ha t'a yichanh, ¿tocwal stechaj cuuj?
Ha yuj yowal sk'ol Dios tz'ib'xik'e lum niwac witz, tz'el lum k'acap, malaj mach ojtannac tato tzuji juntzanh chi'.
Ayic stzicub'tanhan lum lum tik t'a yet'tal, tz'ib'xi sb'achnub'al lu'um.
Ha Dios chi' syal yalan t'a k'u to max jawilaj, syalanpax t'a k'een k'anal to max yak'laj yoc k'een.
Malaj junok mach ix kolwaj yet'oc ayic ix yak'anb'at jenhan satcha’anh. Anheja' pax stek'anem sat ha' mar yic sk'e chulnaj ha'.
A' ixb’o’an juntzanh k'een k'anal scuch niwan Osa, k'een Oxd'ilanh, k'een Mootz yet' juntzanhxo k'een yaman yaji scheclaj t'a stojolal sur.
Manhxo b'ischajb'enoc tastac satub'tac sk'ulej. Ha juntzanh chi' malaj junok mach syal snachajel yuj.
Tato tzek' Dios t'a ko tz'ey, max yal-laj quilani. Tato tzek' t'a chi' ¿toc snachajel wuuj?
Tato ay tas syik'ek' t'a junok mach, ¿mach syal scachanoch waan? ¿mach syal sk'anb'an t'ay tas sk'ulej?
Tato scot yowal sk'ol Dios chi', max yal yoch waan t'a ichnhej ta'. Ha heb' ayoch yet' Rahab ol kan heb' t'a yalanh yuj.
Yuj chi', ¿tas lolonel syal walani yic tzin pacan d'ha Dios?
Wach'chom malaj in mul, palta max yal-laj in tak'wi t'ay. In juezal yaji, tzin k'anan yok'elk'olal t'ayin.
Q'uinaloc swavtej Dios chi' b'aj tzin ch'olb'itaji, wach'chom sk'ochi, palta ¿tocwal ol scha yab' tas swala'?
Axo tz'aji, tzam in yak' lajwoc yet' junok ik'nhab' te ov, swach' nivtaj in yaelal tik t'a ichnhej ta'.
Maxtzac xom yal wik'an wip junok rato. Tzam te wach' nivtaj in yaelal tik yuj.
Q'uinaloc swak' pural Dios chi' yic sb'oan icha tzin nib'ej, max yal-laj yujto aton Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil. Q'uinaloc swavtej t'a yichanh heb' juez, ¿mach syal yak'an pural sk'ochi?
Q'uinaloc swala' te wach' in, haxo in lolonel sch'oxaneli to ay in paltail. Q'uinaloc swala' to malaj jab'oc in paltail chi', axom Dios tz'alani to manh yeloc.
Wach'chom a in tik malaj in mul, palta malaj welk'och t'a yol in sat, maxtzac yal in k'ol pitzan in.
Ha in naani, lajanxonhej smasanil. Ha Dios chi' satanel heb' ay smul yet' heb' malaj smul.
Q'uinaloc sjawi chamel t'a yib'anh masanil anima, malaj tas sna Dios chi' ayic slajwiel anima malaj smul.
Skan jun yol yib'anhk’inal tik t'a yol sk'ab' heb' chuk yuj, smacchaj sat heb' juez yuj. Tato manhoc Dios sk'ulani, ¿mach sk'ulan jun?
Elanhchamel tzek'b'at in k 'inal, malaj jab'oc tzalajk'olal swila'.
Lajan wal sb'ey in k 'inal tik icha sb'ey junok te' balso t'a sat ha ha', aton te' b'ob'il yet' te' papiro. Lajan pax icha sb'at xumumoc nok' ch'acb'a yic syaman schib'ej nok'.
Q'uinaloc sb'atcan in yaelal tik satk'olal wuuj, tzalajk'olal am tzin ajcani.
Palta masanil in yaelal tik tonhej tzin somchajel yuj, yujto wojtac to max in yal Dios wach'il.
Tato ay in mul yalani, nab'anhej swak' wip walani to wach' in.
Wach'chom tzin b'ic in k'ab' yet' nok' xapon, ma yet' yal taanh,
palta ha Dios tzin yak'nhejem t'a skal ha ha' sok'omtac, haxo in pichul sq'uixwi wuuj.
Max yal in pacan in b'a d'ha Dios icha t'a junok comon anima. Max yal walani to syal in b'at yet'oc t'a yichanh heb' juez.
Comonoc ay junok mach syal yak'an wil-laj in b'a yet'oc, syalan tas tzonh aj ko chawanhil.
Octom ay junok mach syal yalan t'ay yic tz'och waan yak'anoch in yaelal, tz'och waan in xib'tani.
Tato icha chi', maxtzac am in xiv in loloni, yujto malaj in mul icha eyalan tik.
